info.name: Haszkod - dark redesign
info.description:
Small redesign for Haszkod.pl. UI is now bigger, darker and more fresh.

<small>*Firefox version looks different (logo and comment vote), because there is problem with image source replace.</small>
info.additionalInfo: Changelog Release 1.02: • Globalize all colors. Release 1.01: • Advertisements size fix, • Emoji box size fixed, • Styled shoutbox menu showed on user name click. Release 1.0: • Chat send button fix, • Firefox logo fix, • First page width fix, • Cookie header changed, • "Pokaż hashcode" button styled. • Recommended footer changed ( some times was been on description field). • Recommended cover expose
